name: おけけぬき
description:
Mouse
　Move mouse to move tweezers.
　[Left click[/u] to grab the hairs.
　Grab the hair and move the mouse to pull out the hair.
　Right click and hold mouse button to rotate the leg.

　Keyboard.
　Use A,D keys to move the camera left and right.
　Use Ctrl,Space to move the camera up/down.
　Press W,S to Zoom in/Zoom out.
　Press Tab to open the Skill Selection screen.
　Press Esc to switch to the Suspend Menu.
